pages.title: Architect Vaults
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Architect Vaults$() are special Vaults, which start with a single room, with a $(#033dfc)Vault Stabilizer$() in the center of the Room, upon clicking the Stabilizer, you have a $(#033dfc)15s$() Window of voting 3 directions with different outcomes.

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: Every Architect Vault starts with a 20s $(#033dfc)Vote Lock Timer$() which stops the ability to vote until that timer expires. Each Vote with either decrease it, or increase it.$(br2)To complete the Architect Vault, you need to generate a random amount of rooms, signified by the bar at the bottom of your screen. Once filled, you receive the option to create a $(#033dfc)Vault Portal$() Room.

To roll this Objective, you need to apply a $(#033dfc)Seal of the Architect$() to a $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() if the Crystal is not exhausted.$(br)These Seals may be $(#033dfc)crafted$() or obtained by other methods, like $(#033dfc)looting in the Vault$() or purchasing them in the $(#033dfc)Soul Shard Shop$()
